      • pcdOut

        public void pcdOut(int scope,
          java.lang.Appendable out)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the DBPCD representation of the database schema to a writer object
        Parameters:
        scope - the level of scope to write the database schema.
        out - the writer object to output the PCD code.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
